p: As for the propolis or bee glue, which is a resinous mixture produced by honey bees, it is also reported to present effective antimicrobial characteristics against Pseudomona aeruginosa, Salmonella typhi, Escherichia coli, Staphylococcus aureus, Bacillus subtilis, Enterococcus sp. and Candida spp. ( Sforcin, 2016; Zabaiou etÂ al., 2017). Overall its composition consists of wax (30%), resins (50%), balms (10%) essential oils and aromatics (5%), pollen, polyphenols, flavonoids and active components (5%).
